title: Take $150 off the M1 Mac mini in all-time-low pricing
content:
If you want to avoid the stress of Black Friday shopping, here’s an excellent Mac deal you can grab right now: Amazon is selling the 512GB Mac Mini for $750 when a $29 discount is automatically applied at checkout, matching the lowest price we’ve ever tracked.

The M1 Mac mini is the only Apple silicon Mac that doesn’t come with a screen, but it doesn’t skimp on performance. You get an 8-core M1 processor with 8GB of RAM and 512GB of storage along with a pair of Thunderbolt/USB 4 ports, two USB-A ports, HDMI, ethernet, and a headphone jack. Its small enclosure means it can fit just about anywhere.

The Mac mini isn’t in stock but you can order one for delivery November 28. Apple is also selling the 256GB model for $600, a savings of $100.
author: Michael Simon
